General.Name: Yooshin Engineering Corporation
General.Description: Yooshin Engineering Corporation provides engineering consulting services in South Korea and internationally. It offers various services, including feasibility study, preliminary and detailed design, and construction supervision services. The company provides its services for transportation sector, such as harbor, airports, railroads, subway, roads, tunnels, bridges, wind forces, waterworks, and environment plants. It also offers various planning and design services in the water resources, urban planning/ site development, leisure recreation and landscape, and environmental, as well as water supply and sewerage, and electricity sectors. Yooshin Engineering Corporation was founded in 1966 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
